--- layout: archive title: "Teaching" permalink: /teaching/ author_profile: true --- I have been working as a Teaching Assistant since August 2020. Throughout the last three semesters (Fall, Spring and Summer) I helped teaching and preparing materials for the following courses: a. Data Structures (Fall) with Professor Jim Kiper – helping with co-teaching labs, grading students’ work, and hosting office hours https://www.miamioh.edu/cec/academics/departments/cse/academics/coursedescriptions/ cse-274/index.html b. Fundamentals of Programming and Problem Solving (Spring) with Instructor Meisam Amjad – helping with co-teaching labs and hosting office hours https://www.miamioh.edu/cec/academics/departments/cse/academics/coursedescriptions/ cse-174/index.html c. Machin Learning (Spring) with Professor Philippe Giabbanelli – preparing course materials (Jupyter notebooks) for laboratories https://miamioh.edu/cec/academics/departments/cse/academics/course-descriptions/cse- 470c/index.html d. Mobile Application Design and Implementation (Summer) with Professor Michael Zmuda – helping with grading students’ work https://miamioh.edu/cec/academics/departments/cse/academics/course-descriptions/cse- 470j/index.html e. Data Structures (Summer) with Professor Michael Zmuda – helping with grading students’ work, and hosting office hours https://www.miamioh.edu/cec/academics/departments/cse/academics/coursedescriptions/ cse-274/index.html f. Robotics (Spring and Summer) with Adjunct Instructor Jim Leonard – preparing materials and exercises for the future course on ROS
